title: Ways to Set a Color's Alpha Value
description: This lab is about setting a color's alpha value using the Python Matplotlib library. Alpha value is a measure of transparency, where a value of 0 means completely transparent and a value of 1 means completely opaque. We will explore two ways to set alpha value in Matplotlib: using the alpha keyword argument and using the (matplotlib_color, alpha) color format.

meta.title: Setting Color Alpha Values in Python Matplotlib
meta.description: Explore two ways to set alpha value in Matplotlib: using the 'alpha' keyword and the '(matplotlib_color, alpha)' color format.
